properties.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued February 12 at 3:17AM CST until February 13 at 12:00PM CST by NWS Chicago IL
properties.description:
...Accumulating snow Expected Later Today into Thursday...

* WHAT...Snow expected. Total snow accumulations of 2 to 5
inches.

* WHERE...La Salle County.

* WHEN...From 2 PM this afternoon to noon CST Thursday.

* IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. The hazardous
conditions could impact the Wednesday afternoon and Thursday
morning commutes. Pockets of blowing snow could further reduce
visibilities late tonight and into Thursday morning.
properties.instruction:
Slow down and use caution while traveling.

The latest road conditions for Illinois can be obtained on the
internet at www.gettingaroundillinois.com.

NWSheadline: WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 2 PM THIS AFTERNOON TO NOON CST THURSDAY
